python_kemptech_api.api_xml module

Encapsulate the awful XML response and provide helpful functions.

python_kemptech_api.api_xml.get_data(xml)[source]

Return the ‘Data’ entry from LM’s XML as a dict

python_kemptech_api.api_xml.get_data_field(xml, field)[source]

Get the value of a field in the ‘Data’ part of the LM’s XML

python_kemptech_api.api_xml.get_error_msg(xml)[source]
python_kemptech_api.api_xml.get_success_msg(xml)[source]
python_kemptech_api.api_xml.is_successful(xml)[source]

Return True if xml response contains a success, else false.

python_kemptech_api.api_xml.parse_to_dict(xml)[source]

Return the XML as an OrderedDict.
